programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When people that barely know each other start falling in love, Gumball thinks he knows whos behind it. He rushes to Sarahs house and finds her writing in a magic notebook that turns everything in it into reality. When everything in Elmore gets crazier and crazier theres only one thing for it: they have to write their way out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Anais has been facepalming every time her family does something stupid, which has led to a serious medical condition.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The kids try to help Dad bond with Frankie. / When the uncomfortableness between them reaches new levels Gumball and Hot Dog Guy decide they have to confront their ongoing awkwardness by making things as awkward as possible. / The kids realise that theyve never known their neighbours name, and theyre way past the window where they can ask. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesnt know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates. / Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball tries to convince Leslie hes an expert on all things plant-related. However, when Leslie realises Gumball hasnt got a clue what hes talking about, he decides to call his bluff. An escalation of dangerous dares and stunts ensue as they try to out-plant each other.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: After accidentally bumping into each other in the grocery aisle, Nicole and her parents have it out. The Wattersons discover why Nicole and her parents havent been on speaking terms for so long. The kids decide to bring about a reunion, in order to secure that backlog of birthday and holiday presents...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Nicole decides to pay the cable bill in person at Chanax, she leaves specific instructions for Richard to stay in the car. However hes far too tempted by the vending machine in the foyer to follow her advice. Chanax believes Richard is their mysterious founder and follow his every whim, leading to their inevitable demise.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Gumball is given a cursed video-game console Elmore becomes trapped inside a fantasy RPG world. Gumball, Darwin and Anais have to battle their way through town, unravelling the secrets of their new virtual reality. But theyll have to level up if theyre going to stand any chance against the mysterious final boss...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The family go to visit Richards Dad. Based on his basic living standards and extended absence from Richards life, they assume Frankie must have done a stretch in the slammer. When Frankie comes to stay with the Wattersons, they decide the way to make him comfortable is to make him uncomfortable and turn their house into a prison.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are confused when they meet Kiki and Quack, a pair of siblings that copy everything they do and say. Then they find out this copycat family is making money online from imitating the Watterson family! When they fail to encourage them to find their own identity, the Wattersons realise they need a more permanent solution...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin realise Grandpa Louie has no friends on Elmore Plus, they feel bad. So they create one - called Muriel. However when Granny Jojo finds out Louie has been spending time online with another woman, Muriel not existing isnt going to stop her being destroyed.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Wattersons discover a family of cartoon copycats who mimic their every move. / Grandpa Louie has a new online friend - the only problem is she isnt real. / The kids find out that Richard has been being picked on by the same person since high school. / Gumball and Darwin decide to use online reviews to wrangle free stuff. / A mysterious package shows up at the Wattersons house and they do their best to avoid opening it. / Darwin likes a girl in his class so Gumball decides its time to play cupid. / Gumballs smart answers arent the correct ones and hes forced to go back to kindergarten. / Gumball and Darwin discover the real reason Dads diet wasnt working. / Gumball discovers that Rob his old nemesis is neme-seeing someone else now.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Dad gives Larrys Hairdressers a bad review for saying hes bald, he gets offered a free haircut. This inspires Gumball and Darwin to go on a reviewing-spree across town, forcing Larry to give them stuff with the threat of a bad review. Just because the customer is always right doesnt mean that what theyre doing isnt wrong.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Wattersons receive an unmarked package in the mail. To distract themselves from the urge to open it, they all take turns to imagine what it might contain. To Mom it could mean financial freedom, to Gumball it could mean superpowers: to whoever its actually for, it means theyre not getting their package.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. He tries to protect them from the world around them and soon Darwins over-protective control-freakery spreads to every corner of Elmore. The Wattersons have no choice but to overthrow his despotic regime.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. Gumball and Darwin help Anais make up an imaginary friend who, much to all their surprise, appears in front of them. Gumball and Darwin teach Anais and her new friend how to become friends, but soon realise that he might not be so imaginary after all...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society that gives preferential treatment to its own members. He tries everything to uncover this non-existent society, making everyones lives miserable in the process. Eventually, in an attempt to restore some peace, the pupils and teachers decide to give him exactly what he wants.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin have spent all their pocket money, so will have to wait until the following weekend to see "The Screamening". Its the scariest film of the year. The only problem is everyone else has seen it, and wont stop talking about it. Gumball is determined to avoid all spoilers. Will he succeed? Sorry, no spoilers..

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin hit snooze too many times on their alarm clock and miss the school-bus. Miss Simian has threatened to expel them if they dont get to school on time. A mysterious clock appears showing exactly how long they have to get to school. When it looks like they arent going to make it in time, they stop the clock which effects the space/time continuum.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin hit snooze too many times on their alarm clock and miss the school-bus. / Things keep going missing in the house so its up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. / Gumball refuses to get out of bed because he is in a lousy mood.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society... / Gumball and Darwin want to see the scariest film of the year. / Gumball and Darwin hit snooze too many times on their alarm clock and miss the school-bus. / Things keep going missing in the house so its up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. / Gumball refuses to get out of bed because he is in a lousy mood. / Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Darwin joins the school marching band, and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin put Anais new friend -- Josh -- through a series of tests, to see if hes good enough for their sister. However, when the boys extreme methods start freaking Josh out, he questions whether being Anaiss friend is worth the trouble. So Gumball and Darwin end up having to convince Josh to give Anais a second chance.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are convinced its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore in search of adventure, it becomes apparent exciting things are happening just not to them.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. / Gumball and Darwin have to stop Alan from becoming Class President of Elmore Junior High. / Nicole remembers the day she first met Richard, and the different choices she could have made.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When a typically stressful Watterson family dinner pushes her to the edge of her sanity, Nicole starts reminiscing about the time she met Richard. Might her life have been better if shed never stopped to talk to her future husband and taken a different path instead?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When the Wattersons internet cuts out, they have to adapt to a world without it. / Gumball decides to make some changes when an online personality test tells him that hes "The Loser". / Rocky is trying to find love with the help of the latest dating app… / Gumball and Darwin give Bobert specific instructions to ensure he acts safely. When Bobert starts applying his robot logic to their rules they realise they must be much clearer.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball is livid when an online test keeps telling him that his character-type is "The Loser". Hes convinced that the only way to shake off this label is to do the opposite of everything he normally would. But Gumball suppressing his natural instincts leaves a vacuum, a Gumball-shaped hole that someone has to fill. That someone is Tobias, who starts turning the whole show into a cliched sitcom.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: A chance encounter with the woman of his dreams inspires Rocky to stop living life online and find love with the help of the latest dating app. Gumball and Darwin try to help Rocky through the tricky world of online romance. In the race to find Rockys dream girl they discover that people can forgive almost anything when you tell them youre acting in the name of love.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin give Bobert specific instructions to ensure he acts in a safe and responsible manner. When Bobert starts applying his robot logic to their rules, they soon realise theyre going to have to be much clearer. Or he will end up destroying them all...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Nicole tries (and fails) to hide her disappointment when Richard and the kids fail to remember her special day. Richard has to figure out what special day he has actually forgotten, and then make it a day to remember… or else!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: From a high-speed police chase to the inside scoop on Daisy the Donkey, Channel 6 Elmore News has all the top hard-hitting local stories. Experienced newscaster Kip Schlezinger is the man to bring you the latest news, sports and weather, even when there is absolutely nothing to report...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny amazing sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Darwin asks Gumball to teach him how to skate Gumball makes sure that he covers every aspect of the skating lifestyle - from wearing the right gear using the right terms and choosing the right board. But when Darwin finally gets his wheels rolling he realises there might be one important aspect of skating that Gumball hasnt taught him...

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin wants to get back a love letter he wrote to Carrie before she sees it.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin use Mollys time-halting power (because shes so boring) to avoid an after school beatdown by Tina.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Wattersons are surprised to discover that their past actions have consequences. / Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mum and Dad for being old their voices start to break. / Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / The secret behind Antons immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except its a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name. / Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The new Coach witnesses Jamie bullying the other kids at lunch and steps in. Jamie is made to apologise, much to the amazement of the other kids. Gumball and Darwin worry about Jamie seeking revenge, especially when they see him sneaking into the back of Coachs car. They use their newly acquired gym skills to save the Coach from being bullied.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The secret behind Antons immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except its a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Antons little toasty body disintegrates during a swim class. When Gumball and Darwin see Anton the next day, as good as new, they set out to discover his secret. It turns out that his parents use a special formula to bake new Antons when necessary. So the kids test it out at home and end up baking a clone army whose leader - Ant-one - wants to destroy Anton and take over the world.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin must stop an evil social media app from turning every kid in Elmore into mindless internet-trend-following drone.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Anais enlists her dads help with her science project, Richards GUT becomes its own brilliant thinking entity, separate from the original Richard we all know, and Anais must choose between the two.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: After begging Dad for a puppy, the kids are taken aback when he comes home with a turtle. Despite the fact that the turtle turns out to be extremely aggressive (especially toward Gumball) they try their best to give it the love it deserves. This achieves nothing. The Evil Turtle escapes and goes on a rampage, and they have to find it before it destroys Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Mom reveals that Gumballs real name is "Zach", Gumball adopts a cheesy, annoying persona to match the name. His family try to make him remember the old Gumball, as this new Zach persona is progressively taking over Gumballs life and erasing his memories. If they cant reach him in time, the old Gumball will disappear forever and theyll be left with Zach!

programme.title: Lana Longbeard

programme.desc: Gumball discovers that Rob, his old nemesis, is "neme-seeing" someone else now. Devastated that Rob has fallen out of hate with him, Gumball refuses to accept that his ex-nemesis has moved on and does his best to sabotage Robs blossoming relationship with his new foe, Banana Joe.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Wattersons run out of money and are torn between being broke and selling out. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash. Gumball protests as he is convinced its selling out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Dad has to make the kids on time for their first day back at school. But hes overslept and now he cant find Gumball, Darwin or Anais anywhere. He sets about retracing his steps from the day before, to work out where they might be. When he finally figures out where they are, its a race against time to rescue them and prove to himself - and Mum - that hes not a bad father.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin discover that Rob, who once swore to wreak vengeance on them, has been trying to destroy them for some time. But his traps never work. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment. An array of diverse characters you may have noticed lurking in the background of Gumball and Darwins adventures finally let their voices be heard. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball is in such a bad mood that it spreads to Darwin, who joins him in complaining about everything. Their constant moaning grabs the attention of the good people of Elmore. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: For once in his life Gumball is the one whos owed an apology. / Gumball and Darwin befriend Clayton who is a compulsive liar and begins contaminating them with lies. / The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin discover his diploma is fake, Principal Brown is determined to keep their discovery a secret. He offers them all sorts of "incentives" to keep quiet but the truth is they really dont care whether the diploma is real or not. Mistaking their disinterest as "playing hard to get" Principal Brown resorts to increasingly desperate measures to ensure Gumball and Darin play ball.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball

They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: After a health scare the kids decide to reunite Mr Robinson with his son. Mr Robinson has always seen Rocky as a disappointment so when Gumball and Darwin help him land a corporate job at Chanax, he is thrilled. However the Chanax corporation is not quite what it seems. Can Gumball and Darwin rescue Rocky before he becomes a corporate drone for all eternity?

programme.title: Lana Longbeard

The two kids try to spruce up the boat, only to leave it a wreck in a series of mishaps and cons by Trash Imp. Now Lana and Bo must race around Weymouth to repair the Windbreaker before Andar and crew return with Admiral Lovejoy.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: When Lana wants to steer the Mighty Windbreaker, Andar makes up a bogus rule that you need to have a beard before taking on such responsibilities. programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

At first it seems like a massive improvement, but the many flaws in the new operating system become increasingly apparent. After the upgraded Bobert malfunctions one too many times, the kids decide to reinstall his old operating system. But will they be able to downgrade from the upgrade and get their old friend back?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

But, hardcore fans that they are, the Wattersons are determined to be the first to see the movie and so set about battling their way to the front of the queue.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin must stop an evil social media app from turning every kid in Elmore into mindless internet-trend-following drone.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Anais enlists her dads help with her science project, Richards GUT becomes its own brilliant thinking entity, separate from the original Richard we all know, and Anais must choose between the two.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. Darwin and Gumball intervene to help Clayton start embracing the truth. However, when they discover the move is as effective as he claimed, they really wish hed been lying.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When the Witches leave on vacation Toms dreams of rest and relaxation are ruined when their ghost nephew Grayson comes over and throws a giant ghost party. When he steals the witches crystal ball Tom and Jerry must travel into the afterlife to steal it back.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Bigby invents the Asteroid Buster Elite which Jerry uses for fun to destroy asteroids. Tom accidentally gives himself electrical superpowers after causing a power outage. Jerry must fend off Tom while fighting off an asteroid heading right toward their lab.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired by Dutch to find his missing cursed ruby that causes him to have bad luck when its missing. They help him find Roxie the burglar but find out that shes also being cursed by the ruby.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom eats some canned cheese that has gone bad and hallucinates.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys excited to try out his new Rocket Boosters. Hes so excited that he overloads them and becomes stranded on a dangerous moon with Madhu. Its up to Ella to jog Madhus memory so they can find the right moon and save Slippy!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a botched update causes Maggie to reboot as "Magz", a super fun party animal, Ella, Slippy and Madhu are excited! At least until "Magz" excessive ways put them all in danger! Now, our gang have to figure out how to get Maggie 1.0 back, pronto!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a probe arrives from Madhus sibling, our gang sets off to find something amazingly special to send back! But despite their incredible adventure to obtain some super cool moon water - Madhu realizes the most special "thing" they have isnt a thing at all...

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys attempts to impress his cousins with constellation drawings goes awry, causing them to get lost in a nebula! As the nebula messes with their racers and gadgets, escape becomes hopeless. Its up to Ella and Madhu to find a way to guide them safely back home!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Space Junk smashes into their clubhouse, Ella and Slippy set off to fix the problem. While Ella wants to be rid of the junk, Slippys determined to reuse or at least recycle it. When Ella is trapped, re-using space junk may be the only way to save her!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Its Halloween and Toad boasts of having a ghost in Toad Hall. His friends go to see if its true but it turns out to be an elaborate hoax. Or is it?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: The weasels hear of Toads fear of scarecrows and use this to frighten Toad out of Toad Hall for good.

programme.title: Toad and Friends

programme.desc: Kingfisher is singing a very irritating song, to everyones annoyance. Only Chief Weasel appreciates the song because he can use it to get Tinker and Smudge to obey him. But will Kingfisher now ever be able to leave the Wild Woods?

programme.desc: Mr. Bean likes nothing more than to relax on his sofa with a good meal and his favourite telly programme. programme.desc: Mole is making his winter supply of jam but its Portlys birthday and Mole very generously gives everyone a jar of jam to give to Portly for a birthday present. Soon he has none left for winter. And Portly has rather a lot of jam!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Its the Midsummer Festival and everyone is contributing to it, with Badger as the master of ceremonies, the Jack of the Green. But when he finds himself trapped in his own home, how can the festival start?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Once again Grizzy shows the Lemmings that they just dont measure up to him physically and that the last jar of chocolate spread is for the strongest. / The Lemmings lay their hands on a full crate of chocolate spread which they hide somewhere behind Grizzys back. / Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living. / The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. / Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. / The Lemmings shiver with cold sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her, he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude. This demands practice, of course, but it especially demands lots of willpower and concentration to get rid of the rowdy Lemmings without losing ones temper.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: A battle among Superthings throws the new Kazoom Kids into a surreal world where everything they draw and erase... comes to life!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.sub-title: Tom and Jerry: Santas Little Helpers
programme.desc: Everyones favorite cat-and-mouse duo, Tom and Jerry, is joined by Nibbles Mouse, aka Tuffy, as they ring in a wild wintertime celebration in the all-new holiday special Santas Little Helpers. Jerry and Tuffy are living the good life in Santas workshop -- until the day Tom is rescued by the Claus family! With Tom in the house, theres nothing but merry mayhem at the North Pole. But when the dust settles, can the comically destructive duo work together to save Christmas and learn the true meaning of friendship? Directed by Darrel Van Citters and written by Jim Praytor and Robert Zappia, this wacky Tom and Jerry outing features the voice talents of Tom Kenny, Gary Cole, Simon Helberg, Julie Wittner, Grey DeLisle and Rachael MacFarlane.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.sub-title: It Aint Over Until the Cat Lady Sings
programme.desc: When Kitty Caterwaul goes missing the night before the opening of her new musical, "Kitty Foiled," her agent begs Tom and Jerry to take on the case. The search leads the detectives backstage, where they encounter chaos and no shortage of people who could have had a motive. Will the clues lead them to a culprit much closer to home?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: On the edge of the village of Catsylvania, a bat snatches up Tom by his tail. He is carried off to a castle in the mountains and emerges in a full Dracula cape and fangs. The real Dracula appears and demands a snack. Tom swoops down on a tiny mouse village, scaring the villagers and carrying off a few. An angry mob with torches and rakes call on Jerry Van Mouseling to go rescue their kin.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After Ginger keeps an abandoned pet hamster unbeknown to Rick, Jerry takes its place after the hamster scurries off. However, Jerry soon gets displaced by baby hamsters that keep multiplying. Soon the situation is out of control.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans tranquillity is shattered by deafening roadworks outside his bedroom window. Threats, sabotage and subterfuge all fail to quell the cacophony until Bean has the ingenious idea of feeding the workmen into peaceful submission. But the silence ends with a bang!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean likes nothing more than to relax on his sofa with a good meal and his favourite telly programme. Unfortunately, a painful explosion of springs under his bottom puts an end to that. He sets about buying another one… but, alas, sofas are expensive items. TV dinners may well be a thing of the past for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. Mr. Bean finds a treasure map in a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, but its tricky clues lead him up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem - but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Safety standards at the Docs Lab remain shockingly low. Once, just once, it would be nice to invent something that doesnt then get out of hand and backfire, causing widespread chaos. Well, this shrink ray aint it. At first it works great (which is typical). Lamput is caught in a tiny vial, and the Docs are riding high on the triumph. Then they go over a small bump. Their risk management plan doesnt account for a "small bump". Before long Lamput and Skinny are engaged in a high speed chase through the Boss moustache. Seriously. Someone should just shrink this Lab right out of existence. No, wait, that happens too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput escapes from the Lab, the Boss gives the job of orange-blob-retrieval to Doc Specs and Doc Skinny, who turn out to really suck at orange-blob-retrieval. Lamput gives them the slip again and again, and, true to form, the Docs decide to blame their tools. They convince the Boss to let them use more and more expensive vehicles, using an age-old corporate strategy commonly referred to as "diminishing returns". For scientists, these dudes sure are slow learners.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pursuing Lamput is a dastardly career, but theres a right and a wrong way to go about it. Doc Specs cuts corners, showing up at the Lab with a fake Lamput made out of a jar of marmalade and a couple ping pong balls - a Jamposter! Specs relishes his new role as hero of the day, but his best friend Skinny smells a rat. As does Lamput, who is patently NOT captured. Not to mention a battalion of ants who dont care at all about Specs professional fortunes. Specs plan has a serious use-by date. Lucky Skinny can forgive. As a friend, hes the real deal.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After being thrown out of the log cabin by Grizzy, the Lemmings find a dragon statue with a mysterious stone in a temple. Touching the stone makes a fleeting tattoo appear on their bellies, temporarily endowing them with the mastery of Shaolin Kung Fu. The Lemmings return to the cabin and uproot Grizzy with ease! But Grizzy has not said his last word and manages to get hold of the magic stone.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. During their scuffle, they knock over an army crate which falls into the middle of the bamboo forest surrounding the cabin. Alerted by the noise, a peace missionary panda comes out of the forest and tries to calm down the worked-up adversaries. But will the limitless strategies of Grizzy and the Lemmings get the better of the pandas patience?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. The Lemmings in the audience are super enthusiastic, but Grizzy is outraged by the treatment inflicted upon the bear. He decides to intervene and equips the paper bear with an armor and saber! The Lemmings retort with ninja effigies of themselves and mount an attack to recover the coveted jar of Yummy spread.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings - using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy dismantles the toboggan built by the Lemmings in the log cabin and reemploys the bamboo sticks to build a jacuzzi. When the Lemmings discover the bears piece of work, they imagine a giant waterpark dominated by an immense waterslide. Anticipating the Lemmings desire, Grizzy tries to barricade himself inside but the rodents manage to eject him from the cabin. The bear comes back, protected by a super bamboo armor…

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a drone race throughout the cabin. Grizzy, who was on the verge of falling asleep, interrupts the competition but must contend with the rodents reprisals. Thrown out of the cabin, the bear falls onto a temple dedicated to the Monkey King. He appropriates the statues powers, operating a magic cloud by remote control. Grizzy settles in on the cloud and wins the race before the Lemmings. But a cloud that flies that fast can only arouse lust…

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A tough little cat moves into the alley and kicks Butch out. Can Tom and Jerry help him find a way back in?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry help a runaway champion horse become competitive again. / Tom and Jerry and the gang is stuck at home with Gingers mom Rosemary, who makes the gang eat super healthy, much to everyones dismay. / Tom and Jerry detectives work on a case where they must transport a precious egg on a train, and protect it from several people who want to steal it for their own. / Tom and Jerry work with a very hungry pig to hunt for truffles. / Tom is framed for a crime he did not commit and is sent to prison. Jerry works to clear his name. / Tom and Jerry are in charge of an old cuckoo clock, and Tuffy wants to be friends with the wooden bird inside. Director: Dan Root,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A magicians hat is left behind at Ginger and Ricks house. Jerry runs into it, but when Tom reaches in after him, all he gets are multiple magician props. Tyke and Spike soon join in, and the top hat continues to wreak havoc.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry go on a wild car trip, when the butler instructs Tom to learn to drive. / Tom wins a competition to become the spokescat for a cat food, but everything goes wrong during the filming. / Butler Tom must clean the manors chimneys, but first he must get around a defiant birds / Tom is transformed into a spider monster, and only Jerry Van Mouseling can outsmart this catty crawly fiend. / Tom and Jerry help a runaway champion horse become competitive again. / Tom and Jerry and the gang is stuck at home with Gingers mom Rosemary, who makes the gang eat super healthy, much to everyones dismay. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: While mopping the kitchen floor, Tom uses an odd-looking sponge on a plate to clean up the mess. But the "sponge" turns out to be a rare truffle, which the estates new pig ate. To pacify Cates, Tom and Jerry must find out whether the animal is also good at hunting truffles.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger places her grannys old cuckoo clock in the hall, and it still works! However, the newly arrived clock causes issues when Tom wants to catch the tiny wooden bird inside and Tuffy wants to befriend it.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem - but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. But never one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. She agrees as long as Bean helps her with cooking cleaning etc. 24 hours later and Bean is desperate to see the back of her. The feeling is mutual. But then Mrs. Wicket starts itching …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery and the amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made Bean opens up his own strange successful coffee bar …

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and the jewel thief have a lot in common. They are both round and blue. Also they both like accelerating into blind corners. A full-speed collision results in an accidental identity mixup - suddenly the thief finds himself with a real job at the Lab, and poor old Specs is being used as bedding by a hulking prison inmate. When Lamput decides to open up a can of kick-butt, the thief starts to wonder if a life of crime might be safer after all. Specs has no doubt at all where hed prefer to be. Lamput unveils a surprising skill at the kung-fu nerve-pinch. Specs is busted out of the clink, and returns to the life he loves: sprinting alongside his best bud Skinny, constantly failing to catch ol Lamput.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When the Docs create a sticky gooey substance to trap Lamput, Specs ends up getting stuck together with Lamput instead! Specs and Lamput hate their new sticky arrangement until Specs realises that some things in life are easier with an additional limb and Lamput enjoys being a friend rather than an enemy. Lamput and Specs are inseparable and loving life, but when the Boss calls him to come into work, a failed disguise sets the Boss into a rampage and Specs finds out what its like to be the hunted. Its not nice!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a castle for Elmer the Giant. They admire his toys and use them without his permission.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mac Gopher to build a hot air balloon for him and Tosh to ride in for a festival. Tosh keeps his fear of flying to himself and tries to weigh down the build to avoid liftoff.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: A music video of Lola Bunny using her bulldozer to move things as she oversees various looney builds.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. After struggling to solve a riddle from Riddlers helicopter Quizz, Redbird must learn to speak up and share his ideas with the Batwheels if they hope to figure out the villains scheme.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. The Legion of Zoom are tired of always losing and therefore decide to take a leaf out of the Batwheels book and use teamwork to pull off a daring heist - will they be able to co-operate?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Meathead turns into a genius when he gulps down a bottle of specially formulated water.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The Duke returns from India with some wild animals that escape their cages and begin to terrorize the manor. Tom is tasked with putting everything back in order.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A stranger with a diving rod promises to find water for the farm.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The gang get more than they bargained for when the dog next door shows up.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry save King Arthurs kingdom from and evil sorcerer Morgan.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: On vacation in the west with Rick and Ginger Tom and Jerry encounter the legendary Jackalope!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is making delicious pastries at the bakery, but theres something strange about his ingredients!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own "No Littering" signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to "break" his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its Specs big date! He looks sharp. His beloved is enjoying herself. Lifes good. Things hit a snag when the annoying customer at the next table turns out to be Lamput. Specs comes face to face with some big questions of work-life-balance. Should he be a perfect gentleman and give his partner the attention she deserves? Or spend his evening in a desperate scramble to capture an orange blob? Turns out Lamputs feeling merciful, and helps Specs hoodwink -erm- "impress" his lady. One cant help but wonder how Specs girlfriend will feel once she discovers that that diamond ring shes wearing is actually a shapechanging fugitive from a biochem lab.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a container filled with metal survival food flasks. Primarily filled with vegetables, they do not find favor with the bear, who is more interested in the hi-tech equipment at the rear of the container. Behind his back, the Lemmings find a flask of Yummy and skedaddle with it. But how will they escape Grizzy equipped with his sophisticated gear?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping. The bear confiscates the disco ball and propels the Lemmings far into the distance. They land in an ice cave where they discover a console that lights up the stars in the sky and controls the northern lights. The canopy of heaven starts blinking. The Lemmings transform the ice field into an open-air discotheque!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a strange little gadget from amongst the Forest Rangers belongings: a hand spinner. Grizzy thinks its a silly game until he accidentally tries out the contraption for himself and becomes instantly addicted. What is the secret of this seemingly banal object that make the heads of its enthusiasts spin as well?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Before an audience of penguins and walruses, two teams of Lemmings perform acrobatic high jumps, competing for the winning prize. When Grizzy accidentally jumps in, he quickly gets caught up in the game and the clapometer goes wild! Intoxicated by his victory, the bear is by no means a modest winner! But the Lemmings want their moment of glory in the limelight as well!

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: A labyrinth inside a pyramid puts the Kazoom Kids to the test. Only those who truly collaborate will be able to get near the next Kazoom fragment.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The Lady of the Manors prize Pomeranian, Alfred, must get some pounds off before the big dog show. The butler suggests exercise—chasing a cat perhaps? Tom happily obliges, as Alfreds successful weight loss guarantees him a cushy spot upstairs. Meanwhile, Jerry aims to sabotage Toms efforts.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger go to a couples retreat, they leave Tom with Ricks Auntie Louella. Hearing that shes a whiz in the kitchen, Jerry comes along. The old woman is sweet, but she has a nasty little lap dog that bedevils Tom like crazy. Louella keeps treating Tom poorly, and Tom and Jerry make their plans to escape.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The Lady of the Houses cousins, the Van der Snoots, visit with their prize-winning Persian cat, Prancy Van der Snoot. Tom is warned to make sure that Snooty doesnt catch sight of the pesky manor mice, lest she get upset or dirty her snowy white paws chasing the vermin. Tom is on it, but nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is watching a hypnotist on TV, when the words "you are asleep" hit him hard. He becomes a virtual rag doll and ends up in a jumble of junk for Rick and Gingers yard sale. A woman who thinks hes a stuffed animal buys him. Jerry feels bad and hops aboard the car to rescue Tom.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom falls asleep inside a rolled-up carpet left out on the curb by Rick with a "free" sign attached. When the new owners unload their pickup truck and leave the carpet in front of their home, a sleepy Tom doesnt notice at first that everything is similar to, but a little different than, his usual surroundings. Soon Tom feels that hes landed in bizarro world.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom and Butch compete for the Golden Fez and a chance to be top cat in the United Mouse Catchers they must prove their worth by finally catching Jerry. Butch finds out that Jerry is a tough opponent and also finds that living with Spike and Tyke is no piece of cake.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. He buys-up all the stickers in the neighbourhood and has almost completed his task when Nephew points out that hes missing one: the famous sticker owned by local footballing celebrity Jamie Studds. Bean turns thief to be the best collector of em all.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. / Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! / Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. / Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge - to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little "pimping" …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves. When he realises its the Lemmings who are playing around with a particularly powerful magnet, he has a stroke of genius. He will design a telekinesis trick to impress his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Further to a misunderstanding, Grizzy is persuaded that the she-bear hes in love with has been turned into a frog. While he looks through the rangers books of fairy tales, searching for a means to return his beloved to her original form, the Lemmings try to recover the frog, with whom they have so much fun playing rodeo games.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon not far from the log cabin. When he sees its big, moist eyes, Grizzy melts and adopts the creature. When the Lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in, provoking even more perilous situations!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy builds a look-alike robot to keep the Lemmings away while he prepares a popcorn party for his beloved she-bear. But his doubles artificial intelligence truly leaves a lot to be desired. If only it were as clever as the original...

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When she is accidentally hit over the head, Grizzys beloved she-bear thinks shes a Lemming. Grizzy thinks that another little well-placed bang over the head will knock her ideas back into place. The only problem is that the Lemmings, who are delighted to have a new playmate, have no intention of letting him proceed with his plan.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship and more. Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - everyone, that is, except for Bibi as she failed to stick her landing. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote to perfect her jump...

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship and more. When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because the Jokers van is too dangerous - when Bam then discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset until the point that Redbird has to bail him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Jestahs insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries not to let the big-wheeled bullys words affect her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley Quinn.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship and more. Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favour - however, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman and his latest mission are suddenly in danger...

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build an outer space ball court on Mars. F

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Sunny Seagull hires The Looney Builders to build a carnival on Looneyburgs pier. F

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders take turns distracting Petunia as they build her a big surprise birthday cake in the back yard. F

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The storm of the century is brewing - at least according to Tuffy and Jerry who are giving a little pay back to Tom for tormenting them earlier. / Rick buys the Suck-Up and at first Tom enjoys the machine using it to clean Jerry out of house! But when the Suck-Up takes over the house Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it. / Little Quaker fears his luck will turn for the worse when he walks under a ladder. When a series of incidents happen to everyone but Little Quaker, he thinks he is to blame. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its picture day for Spike and Tom! Spike and Tom both end up covered in mud and in the Laundro-mutt grooming van. A fight leads to a runaway van and a bath they both wanted to avoid. Tuffy and Jerry are determined to be included in this years picture.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Rick blames Tom for letting a cricket into the house and tells him he must get rid of it or hell be sleeping outside. After Tom nearly destroys the house trying to get rid of the cricket, both the cricket and Tom are thrown outside where the chirping insect soon becomes Spikes problem.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is determined to hijack the fun Jerry and Tuffy are having with making paper airplanes. Toms hijinks take a turn for the worse when he realizes hes made a paper airplane out of Gingers great-great grandmothers treasured fruitcake recipe.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: If Tom isnt recovered from his injury before Rick and Ginger leave for their weekend getaway, Tom will be forced to stay at the Jolly Friends Pet Oasis, which is anything but jolly for Tom. Jerry goes to great lengths to tempt Tom to do anything but rest. After all, a weekend without Tom is a holiday for Jerry.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Little Quaker fears his luck will turn for the worse when he inadvertently walks under a ladder. When a series of unfortunate and painful incidents happen to Tom, Jerry and Spike, but not Little Quaker, he thinks he is to blame.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippys instruction. He soon realises its because Glitch saw the comet hes been tracking for months! Slippy is excited - he gets to tag a comet!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ellas best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyones amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still cant nail it

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a friendly game accidentally breaks Maggie, Ella and co set out to find a rare metal to help fix her. But its a metal so rare its only in asteroids! After a few unsuccessful attempts, they realize the knowledge Maggie gave them before she broke could help save the day!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippy wants to watch an eclipse so badly that he makes special safety goggles for himself and his friends. But Ella has a different plan. When she insists on going to watch a binary star supernova, Slippy opts out and heads off on his own.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Animated series for younger viewers. Ella always looks forward to Momella Day. She prepares for the most interstellar Momella Day yet, because they are going to see a small but powerful Red Dwarf star!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Mole is making his winter supply of jam but its Portlys birthday and Mole very generously gives everyone a jar of jam to give to Portly for a birthday present. Soon he has none left for winter. And Portly has rather a lot of jam!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Its the Midsummer Festival and everyone is contributing to it, with Badger as the master of ceremonies, the Jack of the Green. But when he finds himself trapped in his own home, how can the festival start?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lock gates in order to propel his new boat. But this creates a giant wave that demolishes the Otters holt downstream. Toad must now repair their home, finding help from an unexpected quarter.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad installs a new Mauss security system to protect Toad Hall from the weasels but Toads arrogance and rudeness towards Mauss leaves Toad locked out of Toad Hall for good. Only a big mouse sized apology can put things right.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it. The weasels trap Toad in the hammock, leaving Toad Hall wide open for them. Can Toads friends use the hammock to regain Toad Hall?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem - but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. This doesnt matter, though - soon the plane is chocks away with Teddy at the controls and fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.desc: Many of the riverbank folk have their eyes on Toads ripe pears. Ratty offers to guard the pear tree all night but in the morning, all the pears are gone thus mounting an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Rattys brother comes to visit, Ratty has to pretend that he lives in Toad Hall as he had claimed in his letters. / When Mole goes to find Hedge in the Wild Woods without his glasses, the weasels play a nasty trick on him and Mole falls into a ditch with Hedge.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates… a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto the electronic version of the "Ranger Lemming" toy which is capable of reproducing the movements one teaches it, like a smart robot. Grizzy immediately grasps the potential of a robot that could perform chores with rapidity and precision, but the Lemmings would rather teach it to dance.

When the Looney Builders build themselves a playground, Daffy gets so excited about his section that he takes all the supplies for himself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mac Gopher to build a hot air balloon for him and Tosh to ride in for a festival. Tosh keeps his fear of flying to himself and tries to weigh down the build to avoid liftoff.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to embrace and use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage if hes going to put a stop to Pranks latest scheme.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Under-Butler Tom helps the Lord of the Manor have a trouble-free afternoon hunting with his guests shooting skeet, and Toms only job is to keep handing clay birds to the head butler. But Tom gets distracted when he sees Jerry and Tuffy eating the fabulous spread of food for the Lords guests! Tom is so mad he abandons his duty and rushes Jerry and Tuffy, leading to an epic chase.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When a gorgeous feline walks into the Cat and Mouse Detective Agency, Tom is immediately smitten. But someone has already stolen her heart—a heart-shaped cake made for a gangster and his fiancee on their upcoming engagement. He asked for the expensive engagement ring to be baked into the batter as a Valentines Day surprise, but the cake and the jewelry were stolen from the bakery window.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Inside the house, Tom and Jerry get into a full-on brawl. Steam comes out of their ears as they face off. Just then, Ginger and Rick walk in, grab both by the scruff of their necks, and says they have to learn to deal with their anger. Ginger shoves a copy of an anger management book at them. Spike and Tom both roll their eyes but agree to make an effort.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Old Snelgrove, the senior butler, is retiring. There is an open backyard Olympics on the estate to see who will replace him. When the contestants in the field are narrowed down to Butch and Tom, what will the final outcome be?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Red Herring complains to Tom and Jerry that he keeps hearing laughter everywhere he goes. Tom and Jerry bodyguard Red to prevent him from doing anything that might provoke laughter, but Reds goof-ups and fails soon have even them convulsed. Gradually, it gets loud enough that Tom and Jerry can hear it too. Will they find the true source of the laughter?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry awake to the smell of eggs being cooked in the kitchen - Ginger and Rick are making breakfast courtesy of their neighbors fresh eggs. Ginger and Rick talk about how their new neighbor has a suburban henhouse and is raising their own produce. Tom and Jerry team up to target the henhouse for a heist, but its easier said than done.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by a rival childs plane, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge - when the next day comes, his newly-constructed fighter plane is almost ready for take-off, but it lacks a vital part and the local model shop is shut!
